SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Name: USR_USP_D2CAMPAIGNPROCESS_GETPARAMETERS
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Description: Defines a stored procedure that is used within the business process .NET CLR code to retrieve the instance parameters for a given id. See D2CampaignBusinessProcess.vb
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLStoredProcedureSpec.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_D2CAMPAIGNPROCESS_GETPARAMETERS ( @ID uniqueidentifier ) as begin -- do work begin try if @ID is null raiserror 100000 'The Campaign Type parameter value is empty! Unable to continue.'
select CAMPAIGNTYPE from dbo.USR_D2_CAMPAIGN_BUSINESSPROCESS where ID = @ID end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1; end catch end
